## Flyout.setAutoClose() method

Sets whether this flyout automatically closes when blocks are dragged out, the workspace is clicked, etc, or not.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAutoClose(autoClose: boolean): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  autoClose | boolean |  |

**Returns:**

void
